strings.Value: "Don't relax just yet. We still have much to do. We'll just rest a bit and get back on the road."
"To be honest, the food here is not very good..."
"Exactly! I would have never found the Technic League's encampment, if your beauty hadn't beaconed me!"
"You're out of line. I took you into my party to fight, not to flirt!"
"I'm taking care of you because you're in my party now. We'll have to save each other in battle more than once."

{n}With a delighted smile, Octavia inhales the smell coming from the Oleg's Trading Post.{/n} "Fresh bread! I can't believe it... All this time that we sat in cages and crawled in the mud, there were places in the world where they were baking fresh bread!"
"And here we are! I bet they have clean sheets! And maybe we can even take a bath? Ha ha ha, a girl can dream!"

"I know, I know. But don't ruin it for me. The last time I slept in a palace like this was a year ago, when Reg and I escaped from captivity. We got all the way to {g|Hajot Hakados}Hajoth Hakados{/g}... That's where they caught us."
"All right, enough talk! Fresh bread and clean sheets await!"
"You can be sure of that! I've got years of rest to catch up on â€” and I'll be stuffing my face until I turn into a ball!"
"It depends what you compare it to! After the swill they gave us at the {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g}, a royal feast awaits us!"
"You do so much for us! Is it all because you are kind? Or maybe..." {n}The half-elf smiles flirtatiously.{/n} "Maybe it's because you've been charmed by my beauty?"
"I'm joking, I'm joking! Hahaha, don't take it so seriously!"
{n}Octavia laughs out loud. For a moment, something more than just friendliness flashes across her eyes.{/n} "Oh, you are so sweet!"
"Forget about fighting for a moment! We all need a break, especially you!"
